title: What gift cards are accepted for riot points in Australia?
body:
Iâ€™ve heard that some gift cards are accepted to be used for riot points in America but the cards included for America are entirely different to Australia (OCE),_** I was wondering what cards were accepted in Australia for riot points?**_ Thanks!
{{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

replies.body:
Looking at the [Support site](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753254-Cash-and-Gift-Cards-Openbucks-), it seems like the option to pay using gift cards may only be available for NA. There's no information that I can find to suggest otherwise.

I'd recommend contacting [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) directly, as they'll likely be able to give you the information you're looking for.

Pretty much just paysafe cards and prepaid cards.

If you're talking like eftpos gift cards, they might work directly, but if not you can use them at places like Woolies that sell the prepaid RP cards.

Ah thanks, but not exactly what I was looking for. Was wondering what specific gift cards were accepted.
But thanks again :)
